content:
### Bug fixes


* [Baserow:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.baserow.md) Fixed a bug preventing the Sorting option of the Get All operation from working as expected.
* [HTTP Request:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.httprequest/index.md) Fixed a bug causing Digest Authentication to fail in some scenarios.
* [Wise:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.wise.md) Fixed a bug causing API requests requiring Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) to fail.
